title: The Queen, the chef, and the president
brief_description: During Prince Edward Island’s centennial celebrations one of the places visited by Queen Elizabeth II was the tiny pioneer Acadian village of Mount Carmel, restored as part of a winter works project. This film records many amusing sidelights before and during the visit, as villagers did what they could to make sure that everything - lunch in a newly built restaurant, entertainment on an outdoor platform - went smoothly.
